verses.name: Revelation 22:14
verses.text: Blessed are they that do his commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and may enter in through the gates into the city.

verses.name: Revelation 22:15
verses.text: For without are dogs, and sorcerers, and whoremongers, and murderers, and idolaters, and whosoever loveth and maketh a lie.

verses.name: Revelation 22:16
verses.text: I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.
